module.name: RTTICtrls
module.short: Contains controls which access properties in TPersistent objects using RTTI.

descr.p: Provides LCL controls that access properties of TPersistent objects via RTTI (the FreePascal Run-Time Type Information). Every published property can be edited in the Object Inspector. There you have a TOIPropertyGrid which works with TEdit, TComboBox and TButton. The RTTI controls extend these capabilities to edit a single property in an associated persistent object or component. The developer can choose how the property is displayed and edited.
Please note that the current RTTI implementation is limited to published properties. Type information cannot be retrieved for properties with lesser visibility, like public or protected.
rttictrls.pas registers property editors in its initialization section for the following classes and types:

dl.dd: Used for all instances of the class type.
Used for the TCustomPropertyLink.TIObject and TMultiPropertyLink.TIObject properties.
Used for the TCustomPropertyLink.TIPropertyName and TCustomPropertyLink.TIElementName properties.

descr.p: In addition, editors for the following component types are registered:

dl.dd: Used for all instances of the class type.

descr.p: The following components are added to the component palette in the Lazarus IDE:
rttictrls.pas is part of the runtimetypeinfocontrols package.

element.name: TAliasStrings
element.short: TStringList descendant which maps alias names to their values.

descr.p: Some RTTI controls use TAliasStrings to map RTTI values to display values. Eventually accelerate search for Names and Values.
TAliasStrings is the type used for the AliasValues property in TCustomPropertyLink.

element.name: TAliasStrings.IndexOfValue
element.short: Gets the ordinal position in the list where the specified value is stored.

element.name: TAliasStrings.IndexOfValue.Result
element.short: Ordinal position for the specified value, or -1 when the value is not found.

element.name: TAliasStrings.IndexOfValue.AValue
element.short: Value to locate in the list of aliases.

element.name: TAliasStrings.ValueAt
element.short: Gets the value for the alias stored at the specified ordinal position in the list.

descr.p: Index must be in the range 0..Count-1 or an exception is raised when accessing the value for an alias.
The return value is an empty string ('') if a value is not stored for the alias using the NAME=VALUE format.

element.name: TAliasStrings.ValueAt.Result
element.short: Value for the alias at the specified position.

element.name: TAliasStrings.ValueAt.Index
element.short: Ordinal position in the list examined for its value.

element.name: TPropertyLinkNotifier.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TPropertyLinkOption
element.short: Options for the RTTI Control to Property Editor link.

element.name: TPropertyLinkOption.ploReadOnIdle
element.short: Allows reading / updating property values in an Application OnIdle handler routine.

element.name: TPropertyLinkOption.ploAutoSave
element.short: Auto-save the property value when EditingDone is called for the RTTI control.

element.name: TPropertyLinkOptions
element.short: Set of options enabled for a RTTI control.

element.name: DefaultLinkOptions
element.short: Contains the default options enabled in the property links for RTTI controls.

element.name: TCustomPropertyLink
element.short: Provides the connection between an RTTI control and a property editor.

descr.p: Do not publish; it is used internally by the RTTI controls.
Do not publish; it is used internally by the RTTI controls.

element.name: TCustomPropertyLink.Owner
element.short: The RTTI control using the link.

element.name: TCustomPropertyLink.SaveEnabled
element.short: Enable to automatically save changes.

element.name: TCustomPropertyLink.TIObject
element.short: The persistent object with the value for the property.

element.name: TCustomPropertyLink.TIPropertyName
element.short: The name of the property in the persistent object.

element.name: TCustomPropertyLink.TIElementName
element.short: If the property is a set type, the name of the enumeration value can be given here.

element.name: TPropertyLinkPropertyEditor
element.short: Implements the property editor for the TPropertyLink type.

element.name: TPropertyNamePropertyEditor
element.short: TPropertyNamePropertyEditor is the property editor for TCustomPropertyLink.TIPropertyName.

element.name: TPropertyNamePropertyEditor.FPropEdits
element.short: List of TPropertyEditor instances for TIPropertyName.

element.name: TTIElementNamePropertyEditor
element.short: Implements the editor for the TIElementName property in TCustomPropertyLink.

descr.p: TTIElementNamePropertyEditor Property editor for TCustomPropertyLink.TIElementName. Shows all elements.

element.name: TTIElementNamePropertyEditor.FPropEdits
element.short: List of TPropertyEditor instances for TIPropertyName.

element.name: TTIElementNamePropertyEditor.FElementPropEdits
element.short: List of TPropertyEditor instances for TIElementName.

element.name: TAliasStringsPropEditorDlg
element.short: Implements the property editor dialog used for the TAliasStrings type.

element.name: TPropLinkAliasPropertyEditor
element.short: Property editor for TCustomPropertyLink.AliasValues.

descr.p: Provides a dialog used to edit an alias and its value.

element.name: TMultiPropertyLink
element.short: Changes the object reference for multiple RTTI controls in one action.

descr.p: TMultiPropertyLink is a component to switch the TIObjects of multiple RTTI controls at once.

element.name: TTICustomComboBox.MaxHistoryCount
element.descr: Set MaxHistoryCount to a positive non-zero value to enable history in the control.

element.name: Register
element.short: Registers components for use in the Lazarus IDE.

descr.p: The following components are added to the component palette in the Lazarus IDE:
